title: WECRAFT
intro: There are millions of different teas around the world. Let us find the right tea for you, so you can just sit back and relax having the tea that you might really enjoy.

block.heading: Exquisite taste
block.paragraph: Enjoy the finest quality loose leaf teas, freshly sourced from the best tea experts in the UK

block.heading: Seasonality
block.paragraph: As the seasons change, each of our tea boxes comes with a new unique flavour.

block.heading: Bio-degradable
block.paragraph: When it comes to our tea, environmental sustainability is a crucial part of our process.

testimonial.quote: It was incredible. Shockingly so and I am still coming down from it...
testimonial.author: Emma Peel

testimonial.quote: Absolutely stunning service & really lovely tea
testimonial.author: Lesley Pyne

testimonial.quote: Always easy to deal with and the tea is so good
testimonial.author: Debbie Harkness
